content.body: the topic of checking web compatibility of new proposals came up recently. Am I right in thinking some browsers in the past tried to track this at runtime by placing a hidden 'hook' that could see if certain props were accessed? Or was that something from a dream?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: the topic of checking web compatibility of new proposals came up recently. Am I right in thinking some browsers in the past tried to track this at runtime by placing a hidden 'hook' that could see if certain props were accessed? Or was that something from a dream?
